text: Muse Watson (born July 20, 1948) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles as Ben Willis in the I Know What You Did Last Summer franchise, Charles Westmoreland on the Fox television series Prison Break and as Mike Franks in CBS television series NCIS. Watson was born in Alexandria, Louisiana. He studied at Louisiana Tech and at Berea College in Kentucky. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Muse Watson on TV.com * Stars4Autism Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Louisiana Category:Actors from Kentucky
title: Muse Watson
